attributes.action: Allow a national holiday on 19th August 2007 in memory of the most rediculous post ever on LFC.TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 19th August 2006 on the liverpool.tv message boards an infamous user by the name of 'Shiver' asked the question - Why was Robbie Fowlers goal dis-allowed?'. This caused complete uproar amongst the online Reds for one reason and one reason only... Robbie Fowler hit it wide. Please let us remember this stupidity in our own dignified way by allowing us a day of rest on its annual anniversary. Thank you.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
